::The Destrons::

    They reached the base and all went inside. Magmatron =
went to his control room and Cerberus followed him. There he confronts Magm=
atron.
    "What do you think you are doing?" He says grabbing Magmatron by=
 the throat. Magmatron stands up, and Cerberus is hanging from him.
    "I =
am simply ensuring the survival of the Destrons," He said. Then he grabbed =
Cerberus and threw him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Jynx sa=
w the swan bot land, he rushed out and grabbed the swan by the neck. He ran=
 him to the lab, knowing that Magmatron would want him to be Destron.
~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Dachande took Battera by the hand. "=
He can only control me in Beast Mode, which really stinks."
    He led her =
to their Quarters.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The Four Nig=
htmares went and started to pratice fighting styles in the combat room.
